title: Ice Age National Scenic Trail: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       Students Complete "Rite of Passage" on Ice Age Trail 6-2-16 Ice Age Volunteers Honored 5-26-16 Celebrate National Park Week with a ParkRx! Happy Birthday National Parks! Open Houses to be held on Ice Age Trail corridor alternatives through Rock County Marquette County Corridor Planning Process; Local Governments Informational Meeting Schedule, Spring 2013 Ice Age Volunteer wins 2011 National Volunteer Accessibility Achievement Award! December 2011 Ice Age Trail Alliance Summer Saunters Program wins national Award! October 2011 National Park Geteways featured park for the week of August 29, 2011: Ice Age National Scenic Trail. Ice Age NST Enlists Help of Wisconsin National Guard, May 11-15, 2011        "Archeology for Trailbuilders" workshop held in Wisconsin, May 5-6, 2009.      Ice Age Trail Volunteers Receive National Award- May 3, 2009      Presenting an Ice Age National Scenic Trail Corridor for Langlade County, June 10 and 13, 2009
